name: Ext_R5_MeasureReport_inputParameters
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MeasureReport.inputParameters for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport.inputParameters from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: What parameters were provided to the report
element.definition: A reference to a Parameters resource (typically represented using a contained resource) that represents any input parameters that were provided to the operation that generated the report.
element.comment: `MeasureReport.inputParameters` has no related element in R4B:MeasureReport
